review: Last November, I pre-ordered two of these for my daughters' rooms.  My order was pretty much the same day I had heard about them.  Although I did not know whether they'd live up to the apps on my smart TVs/Roku, I could not passed up the introductory price.  Now...  My girls have had theirs for a few months and I'm so jealous.  These things make me really annoyed at my other steaming devices.  I guess it's time to order a couple more.
